lead_paragraph: As a former House speaker, Mr. Boehner can go public with insults he usually leveled behind closed doors, as he did in talking about Senator Ted Cruz.

headline.print_headline: Out of Office, Ex-Speaker Boehner Gleefully Releases Mute Button
headline.main: Out of Office, Ex-Speaker John Boehner Gleefully Releases Mute Button

snippet: As a former House speaker, Mr. Boehner can go public with insults he usually leveled behind closed doors, as he did in talking about Senator Ted Cruz.
abstract: Carl Hulse On Washington column examines impact of former Speaker John Boehner's disparaging comments about Sen Ted Cruz, which he made at event at Stanford University; observes lack of mutual regard between two men makes sense, and contends comments probably only helped Cruz burnish his anti-Washington credentials.
